abstract: Sony's new SLT A77 camera claims to be the world's fastest autofocusing camera.
snippet: Sony's new SLT A77 camera claims to be the world's fastest autofocusing camera.
lead_paragraph: It seems like camera makers are bragging less about how many megapixels are on their sensors - which  is nearly useless as a measure of quality anyway -- but are taking up a new selling point: speed.

headline.main: Sony Unveils a Camera for Speed Demons
